document.title: Adding New Projects
document.paragraph:
This section of the documentation
in_this_section
2 In This Section
adding_projects.xml Adding New Projects
Help with adding new Eiffel projects to new or existing solutions.
projects.xml EiffelEnvision Projects
Describes the number and variety of EiffelEnvision Projects that can be added to any exising or new Visual Studio .NET solution.
